auth.auth-description: This app has saved me countless hours of work and helped me deliver high quality tests for my students.

sign-up.title: Create your account
sign-up.description: Enter credentials to create an account
sign-up.sub: OR SIGN IN WITH EXISTING ACCOUNT

verification-code.title: Continue with code
verification-code.description: Enter code that was sent to your email.

home.average-tests: Your accuracy on all completed tests

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: This is how others will see you on the site.
profile.name: Username
profile.name-description: This is your public display name. It can be your real name or a pseudonym.
profile.code-description: Enter code that was sent to your email.

about.title: About & Appearance
about.description: A small description about our app.
about.subtitle: About app
about.app-explore: Our app is a platform where users can discover and participate in tests provided by various organizations. Whether you`re looking to enhance your skills or gain valuable insights, our app offers a wide range of tests to suit your needs.
about.app-mission: Our mission is to make learning and development accessible to everyone. We believe that continuous learning is key to personal and professional growth, and our platform is designed to empower users on their learning journey.
about.app-thanks: Thank you for choosing our app. We`re dedicated to providing you with a seamless and rewarding experience. If you have any feedback or suggestions, feel free to reach out to us. Happy testing!
about.feature-1: Explore tests from a variety of organizations.
about.feature-2: Participate in tests to assess your skills and knowledge.
about.feature-3: Track your progress and see how you improve over time.
about.feature-4: Receive personalized recommendations based on your performance.
about.feature-5: Connect with like-minded learners and share insights.
